tree

Class ContinuousNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • tree.Node
      • tree.SplitNode
        • tree.ContinuousNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SplitNode>

    public class ContinuousNode
extends SplitNode
    Estende la classe SplitNode e rappresenta un nodo corrispondente ad un attributo continuo.
    See Also:
